name: Public Data Lab
goal: The Public Data Lab seeks to facilitate research, democratic engagement and public debate around the future of the data society.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Currently we mainly follow public information policy (e.g. PSI Directive) and activities around "fake news".
